input_text: Goal: Order a ride to the bakery. Screen: [{'id': 'input_dest', 'text': 'Where to?'}, {'id': 'btn_home', 'text': 'Home'}]
Goal: Confirm the ride. Screen: [{'id': 'txt_price', 'text': '$12.50'}, {'id': 'btn_confirm', 'text': 'Confirm UberX'}]

Goal: Scroll down to find more options. Screen: [{'id': 'list_view', 'scrollable': true}]
Goal: Go back home. Screen: [{'id': 'btn_back', 'text': 'Back'}]
